channel.title: Need help making my server portforwarded!
channel.description:
First off, I have firewall portforwarded ,
[img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/3894/portsfirewall.png[/img]
I have my router portforwarded
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/1600/routerports.png[/img]
Heres a img. of my source running
[img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/9945/sourcerunning.png[/img]
now when i go to runelocus.com to add my server to the status page it says its offline :(

item.title: Need help making my server portforwarded!

@i_pk_mods_ftw wrote:

okay, i will post images.

item.title: Need help making my server portforwarded!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

If you did everything it would be working
I recommend posting which problems you have instead of expecting some one to do it for you.
We are here to help not to spoonfed.

Read full topic
